news.title: Thames Water hit with biggest ever penalty over sewage and shareholder payouts
news.summary: Thames Water must pay a £104.5m penalty for sewage breaches and £18.2m relating to shareholder dividends.

news.title: Dozens injured by Israeli gunfire as crowds overwhelmed Gaza aid site, UN says
news.summary: The UN Human Rights Office says most of the injuries were due to Israeli gunfire, but the Israeli military says troops fired into the air.

news.title: Thousands to get payouts over forced prepayment meter fitting
news.summary: More than £70m is being paid to customers who were forced to switch to prepaying for energy.

news.title: Anti-crime pledges will not be met without extra money, Met chief warns
news.summary: Sir Mark Rowley says forces grappling with years of cuts need more money to meet the government's "ambition".

news.title: Indian man who disguised parcel bomb as wedding gift jailed for life
news.summary: The bomb, disguised as a wedding gift killed a software engineer and his great aunt just days after his wedding in 2018.

news.title: Tesco shoppers mock 'VAR'-style cameras at self-checkout
news.summary: The supermarket's latest use of technology to crack down on shoplifting has led to both jokes and complaints.

news.title: Musk 'disappointed' by Trump's tax and spending bill
news.summary: As the former Doge chief, Musk had worked to reduce government spending which he says this bill contradicts.

news.title: I reported my offensive colleague to the Met - why did he get his job back?
news.summary: Issy Vine reported a colleague who made discriminatory remarks but resigned after he was reinstated.

news.title: Actor Paul Danan's drug use caused death by misadventure, coroner rules
news.summary: The actor was found unresponsive at his home in Bristol after consuming a cocktail of drugs.

news.title: Moment SpaceX Starship spins out of control in test flight
news.summary: Fuel leaks on the rocket caused it to begin spinning, leading to an uncontrolled re-entry through Earth's atmosphere.
